<<<<<<< HEAD
The historie of the holy vvarre by Thomas Fuller ... Fuller, Thomas, 1608-1661. Marshall, William, fl. 1617-1650. Cleveland, John, 1613-1658.
The third edition.
[17], 286, [28] p. : folded map
Printed by Roger Daniel and are to be sold by John Williams ..., Cambridge : 1647.
Added t.p., engraved by William Marshall, preceded by "A declaration of the frontispice" signed: J.C. [i.e. John Cleveland]. Date of publication from Wing. Reproduction of original in British Library. Chronological tables and index: p. [1]-[28] at end. Imperfect: lacks folded map.
=======

Printed by Roger Daniel and are to be sold by John Williams ..., Cambridge : 1647.
Added t.p., engraved by William Marshall, preceded by "A declaration of the frontispice" signed: J.C. [i.e. John Cleveland]. Date of publication from Wing. Reproduction of original in British Library. Chronological tables and index: p. [1]-[28] at end. Imperfect: lacks folded map.
